mcq.statement: Read the following passage to answer question  "The history of science is the real history of mankind." In this striking epigram a nineteenth century writer links science with its background. Like most epigrams, its power lies in emphasizing by contrast an aspect of truth which may be easily overlooked. In this

options.a: تفصیلی حصے میں مکمل حوالہ اور متعلقہ ملاحظہ کریں۔
